headline: The Hartford Appoints Annette Rippert To Its Board Of Directors
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., January 06, 2025--The Hartford appointed Annette Rippert to the company’s board of directors, effective Feb. 18, 2025. She will serve on the board’s Finance, Investment and Risk Management Committee.
